item.description:
You are invited to a Mini Retreat

Saturday, March 21,
9:30am to 1:30pm
Meditating for Consciousness:
a retreat with Andrew Vidich. Andrew shares techniques from saints and mystics to help us awaken from our spiritual slumber. We will practice Jyoti meditation, meditation on the inner Light. Welles Turner Library, 2407 Main St, Glastonbury.

No experience necessary. Registration required.

Also retreat in Ashford, Sunday March 22 - Opening the Heart
Call 860 487-3597
Next retreat - Yoga & Meditation retreat April 18 in Storrs.
item.name: Meditating for Consciousness
